locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice facility,  and clean shower room to utilize. Semi parking is always a struggle everywhere. I dont like it when they allow dropped trailers, bobtail/ box trucks to take up an entire semi length spot, and today happens to be a motorcycle parked here. Management never does anything about these issues.

Taking a shower here it‚Äôs just waste of time.  The water is hot but no pressure at all.  Who ever did the plumbing here dint know what they were doing.  When end of day you look foward for that hot shower after all say driving. And all you get is little sprinkle water coming out.

Easy freeway access with quick gas up, and clean restrooms. Nice having an Arby's available. Had a strange experience with some guy walking around, talking on a cell the whole time we were there. While having lunch, he approached our car so we locked our doors quickly, then he walked away. Be careful out there!

Easy access from the highway (always appreciated). Great little dog park segregated by weight (one for under 30# and the other side over 30#). Dog park was clean. Store was in great shape and the bathrooms were super duper clean (always ‚Ä¶

If you show up anytime after 5pm you will have to wait for a spot or make your own if you can. It‚Äôs a madhouse in this area for truck parking, just not enough.
The store was great, took two showers while I sat for my next load, used the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText:
Lot full of dirt and  giant potholes.
Showers are old and if you want to use the restroom make sure to do before you take the shower because they don‚Äôt have a toilet inside the shower room
‚Ä¶ They ACCEPT My Rewards Cards & You can use your points to take a shower or whatever. ‚Ä¶
Definitely should've went by the reviews. Tried the showers and although it was good temperature, that was the only positive. Clogged up shower somewhere in the pipping

The smallest hole in the dirt Flying J I've ever stopped at in the country.  Wanted $3.64 for a regular size Txix!!! No thanks.  One shower 2 bathrooms. Very little of anything on a dirt lot. No restaurant.

‚Ä¶ A FLYING J TRUCK STOP... Its Dirty, Shady...Wanted to take a shower but after noticing how dirty the place is and worn out, I decided to walk to LOVES and pay for  shower even though I have enough points for shower at pilot or flying J... ‚Ä¶

Can‚Äôt use your shower credits here. Also everything in the store is over priced. Parking has no lighting, full of potholes and no lane markings. The only plus to this place is the friendly staff that‚Äôs why it‚Äôs a two star and not a one

Antiquated truck stop. 2 showers. No toilet in the shower rooms. Very small. Parking limited. The loves under construction will surely take away business. No real complaints from me though. I found parking and a shower. Fit the bill.

‚Ä¶ people. The lot is a dump and that puts it nicely. The showers, there are only 2, are clean but very small and do not have toilets inside the shower rooms. They only have two restrooms so you better hope to not have to go at a peak time.
In spite of its petiteness, the shower was refreshing and clean.

‚Ä¶ flying J name. It a run down little yard barn with old messed up pumps. There's 2 showers and they very very small. Husband/wife teams will likely wanna shower separately they are that small parking lot is small and trashed. Go to the king ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: The first portion of the lot near the store is all reserved, the extended lot in the back doesn't get filled up. I see drop trailers in the back and the same bobtail drivers in front taking up dual spots. Selfish. Besides that, showers are ‚Ä¶
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 960 photos
Typical Pilot. Fuel, food, bathrooms. Pain in the you know what gas pumps. Always a struggle getting Pilot pumps to take a credit card.

It ain't to bad here. It's quiet. Everyone is nice. I only give 3 stars because like most pilot flying j truck stops they haven't figured out how to build bigger bathrooms. I've been trying to get on the toilet for 2 days and there's always a line day and night.

We had stopped by purely due to the price of fuel in Washington. At the time of the visit, the price of fuel was $3.69/gal at the Pilot Truck Center. In the Tri-Cities, the price of fuel was $4.30/gal. Yes, it was definitely worth it. While ‚Ä¶

Very nice store, very clean, well stocked, good restaurants, good food. But manager Britney is the best part. So professional, kind, helpful. And her staff. Well done. Thank you. James  ps. And then general manager Becky in the morning. She ‚Ä¶
Plenty of free parking spaces in overflow lot. Was full around 5 pm.  Thank you for keeping the lot clean.  Friendly staff. Organized clean store. Restrooms are stocked and clean.
Faith WashingtonLocal Guide ¬∑ 169 reviews ¬∑ 510 photos
Clean, fair selection snacks,food, and travel needs.   Cinnabon rolls greet you at the door! Did not use restroom, but the rest of the place was clean.

showerReviews.reviewText: This has stopped being a Truck Stop...it has become a local driver's drop yard.  Over the road drivers can't stop for a meal or a shower. Get your fuel and get out. Well, I didn't get a meal or my shower, but I decided to get my fuel ‚Ä¶
Not only is it cheapest fuel around... Commercial diesel. But if you get over 100 gallons you get half off in the diner and a shower!

Expect 2 hrs to get 50 gal fuel & 5 minute shower. You must literally hand them your permit to get fuel. No the 1 operable shower will not be clean even if you're the only truck there and employees standing around looking bord.
Don't shower at this location they don't clean and the towels are so thread bear they are see threw, the for issues you will have with your feet will take months to get rid of..
Need a shower and clean restrooms, no toilet paper in stall, overfill trash bin.

showerReviews.reviewText: This use to be a nice little stop with a variety of things, now it‚Äôs disgusting, outside, floors, countertops, bathrooms just GROSS. Not greeted at all by 3 men in there working, just talking amongst themselves, candy bar was $3.50 of ‚Ä¶

They have air machine for tires, decent price for gas, good variety for snacks and drinks, emergency oil variety, and public restrooms. Not the best at anything, but has everything you need to rest and fill up, and what you need to do minor ‚Ä¶

Bathrooms are really rough.
Diarrhea on the floors, stalls that won't close.
Trash cans over flowing (like a ton) ‚Ä¶

Pretty good truck stop especially if you're a trucker that would like some privacy and some peace and quiet for once normal truck stops can be a bit noisy Large variety of things to purchase for food bathrooms are not the best but I've been ‚Ä¶
Try to avoid this place if you can.  Super GROSS bathroom. $4 for a king-size candy bar. High gas prices.  Don't reward them with your hard earned money!

showerReviews.reviewText: I have stayed here before. My stay this time wasn‚Äôt as good. It was clean. It appears to be a work in progress. I felt like the outlets near the bed need replacing. Really nice sized TV. My main issue is the curtain that were chosen allowed to much light in at the top. The outside lighting is bright and plenty full.

I‚Äôll be honest, despite all the other reviews, this place wasn‚Äôt horrible. It was clean and ready and within an hour of check in, the housekeeper knocked and brought us the remaining towels they may have forgotten. Upon first glance, it ‚Ä¶

In the mood for a lot-lizzard? Might find one around here, I was propositioned in the parking lot. Room and bed looked clean, no bugs.  It was loud, right next to the hwy and truckstops. Curtains were sheer, you could see in and out through ‚Ä¶
It was clean.

Really kind and friendly people to talk with. Very clean and tidy rooms. Working heating and cooling systems that keep my room really comfortable. The best place to stay a night for the price I got honestly. Hint of tobacco but I didn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This is pretty much your standard truck stop. Being next to the freeway, has is expensive, as expected. The convenience store looks pretty clean and well stocked, and I have always been able to find the typical drinks and snacks that most ‚Ä¶

Made me pay for a drink where the can was already broken. Tried calling the manager and she hung up on me several times. Disgusting restrooms and several times I've gone it the cashier was missing and and I had to wait like 10 minutes to get rung up
Nice neat and clean truck stop. Specially Butter chicken and Rice . They have two showers one for men and one for women . Safe parking at night. Spartan pizza

Love parking here. Well equipped store, staff is fantastic. Overnight fee is very reasonable, and even resetting is a reasonable cost. Food is good & it is very well kept. Showers could use a renovation, but aren't bad.
This is a great place with various food & drink options, the mini pizzas are my favorite. The workers are very friendly & bathrooms are always clean. I encourage anybody to stop by. üëçüèª ‚Ä¶
